import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { } TravelMonde :: Home

Login Register

explore

the best destination for tourists in the world.

Our services include

Flight Tickets

All the flight tickets are bought for you. We guarantee that we can find the best prices for the date you wish to travel.

Accomodation

The accomodation is all booked for you. We offer rooms in 4-star hotels on every location you are going too visit.

What to Do

We offer a schedule with a list of what to do each day, so you do not get lost during your trip. However, you choose if you are going to follow the schedule or not.

Explore and Travel

Holiday finder

Location
Location Paris Istanbul Newyork London Tokyo Venice
Activity
Activity Cycling + Mountain Biking Camping Food Tourism Motorcycle Touring Road Touring Dirt Bike Touring Wine tourism
Grade
Grade Tourist Superior Tourist Standard Superior Standard Comfort

A new way to explore the world

For decades travellers have reached for Lonely Planet books when looking to plan and execute their perfect trip, but now, they can also let Lonely Planet Experiences lead the way

Learn more

Visit the Travel Monde.

The place to find rest, picturesque places and amazing people.
